PLATEAU Workshop
Bringing together Programming Languages and Human-Computer Interaction
Home Registration Prior Year Sites

PLATEAU2025
15th annual workshop on the intersection of HCI and PL
@ Northeastern University, Boston MA USA February 17-18, 2025
102 West Village H

PLATEAU will take place on the Northeastern University campus in Boston, MA from February 17-18, 2025. Conference events will be held at West Village H in room #102.

Attending PLATEAU is free, and it is open to the public. To attend, please complete our registration form.

We've reserved a block of rooms at the Marriot, Copley Place. The deadline to reserve a room is Wednesday, January 29th.

Important Dates
December 4th, 2024 (AoE time)
